subject: Football
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Harvin, a former Seahawks wide receiver, arrived with baggage, but if he can live up to his vast potential, the Jets’ acquiring him will be a “coup,” General Manager John Idzik said.
snippet: Harvin, a former Seahawks wide receiver, arrived with baggage, but if he can live up to his vast potential, the Jets’ acquiring him will be a “coup,” General Manager John Idzik said.
